subtitleNullable: Tweets with #MeghanMarkle extracted before, during and after the Oprah Interview
descriptionNullable:
### Context
Given the hype around the interview of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle with Oprah, it would be interesting to analyse people's reaction on Twitter and a chance to improve your NLP skills. 

### Content
It took me a few days to extract the tweets by trial and error using different source codes. Given the volume, I have to find a code that has faster processing time. The total time taken to extract this dataset is about 6 hours.

If you would like to learn how to get started in extracting tweets, please check out my article [here](https://medium.com/analytics-vidhya/twitter-analysis-with-python-using-tweepy-getting-started-164af4fb667e).

### Task
1. Analyse the sentiment before, during and after the interview such as positive/neutral/negative, emoticons used, number of retweets etc
2. The topic that is most discussed about the interview such as racism, mental health etc

You can have a look at the main topics discussed during the interview and classify each tweet:
insider.com/biggest-bombshells-revealed-prince-harry-meghan-markle-oprah-interview-2021-3

Please upvote this dataset to give it a ranking boost so that more people can submit their analysis. :D

### Acknowledgements
Source code to extract the tweets credit to: [Lukastuong123](https://github.com/Lukastuong123/DeepLearing/blob/master/Project-%20US%20Election%202020%20Twitter%20Sentiment%20Analysis/Part%20A%20(Webscrapping%20with%20TwitterAPI%2C%20EDA).ipynb)

Image credit to: [King's Church International](https://unsplash.com/photos/3y1QMNZzcUU)
